amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for any contract with the communications and public relations firm known as the Lincoln Group.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available by the Act from being used for any contract with the communications and public relations firm known as the Lincoln Group.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 268 (Roll no. 301).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 268 (Roll no. 301).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
